description:
## Objective 
Fix aaction bar behaviour

## Description
The action bar in the app shifts down when we navigate through the app.
The task here is to prevent that behaviour.

More details can be found on the following issue page  on GitHub:
https://github.com/openMF/android-client/issues/1226

## How to get help
If you need help, be sure to post your question to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/community/communications/#mailing-lists) or  ask in our [chatroom](https://gitter.im/openMF/mifos).
name: android-client: Fix action bar behaviour
